ctx: intros n ts v s x H Hin.
intros n ts v s x H Hin.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

original: intros n ts v s x H Hin. induction ts. - simpl. contradiction. - simpl. destruct (Nat.eq_dec v x). + subst. intro Contra. apply list in ListNotInNil. contradiction. + right. apply IHts. intro H'. apply Hin. rewrite <- H'. apply in_cons with (a := n0) in Hin. apply Hin.
